title: Best of The Program |  Guest: Daniel Suhr | 4/26/21
description:
Glenn makes a definitive case that the Great Reset is far from a "conspiracy theory," and a scary step taken by the EU proves it’s approaching fast. Companies are doing everything they can to get people to return to work, but government welfare pays too well. Glenn and Stu take a look at the crazy housing market — is it a good time to buy or sell? Liberty Justice Center senior attorney Daniel Suhr joins with his solution to social justice warriors: "1A Warriors."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
